metadata.title: CVE-2024-31949 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In FRRouting (FRR) through 9.1, an infinite loop can occur when receiving aMP/GR capability as a dynamic capability because malformed data results ina pointer not advancing.

criterions.comment: frr package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
